titles.title: Supporting Transit Commutes Act
Supporting Transit Commutes Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employers to deduct certain transportation fringe benefits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Supporting Transit Commutes Act
This bill allows employers a tax deduction for certain transportation fringe benefits (e.g., commuter and parking costs, bicycle reimbursements) paid to their employees. It also gives employers a 50% tax deduction for the amount of benefits withheld from their employees' wages.
